After the incredible success of our first Chalhoub Women in Tech program with Salesforce, where we saw over 100 registrations, 70 active participants, and an outstanding 755 hours of learning, we are back with our next chapter. This time, we are partnering with Google Cloud, with a powerful new theme: Data & AI.

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Future Developers Start Here

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2016&user=10620> 	

Calling all young innovators! 

We’re excited to invite our Dubai-based team members to register their children (ages 8–14) for our Coding Camp this October. 

Led by our in-house software engineers, the camp will spark creativity, problem-solving, and digital skills through fun, hands-on coding sessions. 
Seats are limited
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2016&user=10620>  | R <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2017&user=10620>  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2016&user=10620> egister <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2017&user=10620>  by <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2017&user=10620>  30 September to secure your spot!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Pre-Fall Style Reset at Wear That

We’re excited to invite you to our Pre-Fall Wardrobe Refresh at Wear That.

Pass by for a midday style reset and enjoy 25% off your wardrobe update, the perfect chance to refresh your looks with the season’s coolest pieces.

From now until 30 September | 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM at Wear That HQ (D3 Building 5)
